name: Delirium (itch) (AshleyZakEdwards)
description:
Delirium is a first-person, murder mystery with horror elements in which the player has to investigate the disappearance of a fellow police officer, believe to have been killed. Investigating the crime scene will lead to finding evidence and information on the true nature of what happened to the missing officer, Jeremy Moore.

I developed Delirium as part of my Game Engine Architecture module during my second year of studies at the University of Westminster. The final submission was to present a game prototype using Unreal Engine, making use of the visual scripting and blueprint tools included in the game engine. As it stands, Delirium is a working prototype in which I hope to develop further in the near future. 

It would be great to hear your feedback about Delirium!
